item.title: What’s The Difference Between Logo Design and Branding
item.description: There is a general perception that “logo design” and “branding” are the same thing. Sometimes these two terms are even used as synonyms. However, although they are closely related and must work together in a cohesive way, they are very different processes. Table Of Contents The concepts of logo and brand explained What’s the difference between logo design and branding? Why is the logo so important for branding purposes? Conclusion The concepts of logo and brand explained Logo design is the process of designing a logo.
